thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Cemex Sab De Cv Consolidated Q4 Net Sales Up By 4 Percent

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cemex Sab De Cv Consolidated Q4 Net Sales Up By 4 Percent
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Cemex Sab De Cv:
* CEMEX SAB DE CV - CONSOLIDATED NET SALES INCREASED BY 4 PERCENT DURING Q4 OF 2017 TO US$3.4 BILLION
* CEMEX SAB DE CV - OPERATING EARNINGS BEFORE OTHER EXPENSES, NET, IN Q4 DECREASED BY 10 PERCENT, TO US$410 MILLION
* CEMEX SAB DE CV - TOTAL DEBT PLUS PERPETUAL NOTES DECREASED BY US$209 MILLION DURING QUARTER
* CEMEX SAB DE CV - CONTROLLING INTEREST NET LOSS DURING QUARTER WAS US$105 MILLION FROM AN INCOME OF US$214 MILLION IN SAME PERIOD OF 2016 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
